description:
Please see the epic issue for details on completing this task. You can view the labels that need both a tooltip and glossary entry in the Google Sheet: http://goo.gl/ofHI4B
The row has been labeled with this ticket #.
Please follow the instructions, reference the source documentation, complete the glossary entry and tooltip and update the Google Sheet.
name: Mifos X Web App - Add Tooltips For Standing Instruction Labels
